content: भृतिः {%<ab>f.</ab>%} [भृ-क्तिन्] {@--1@} Bearing, upholding, supporting. {@--2@} Cherishing, maintaining. {@--3@} Bringing, lead ing to. {@--4@} Nourishment, support, maintenance. {@--5@} Food. {@--6@} Wages, hire. {@--7@} Service for hire. {@--8@} Capital, principal. {@--9@} Wages, hire.
